name: Dinner Tonight: Refried Beans Your Way
description: I just had a revelation last night about something most of you may have already known. Sometimes one little thing can completely change the way you make something as classic as refried beans—and that one thing for me was pork...

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lard to a large iron skillet over medium heat. When it has melted toss in the onion and cook until translucent. Add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds, or until very fragrant.

Dump in the beans along with the water. Let it cook for a few minutes, and then begin the mashing process. You can use a potato masher or even a large wood spoon. Mash to the desired consistency (I like mine a little lumpy).
Season with salt, and any or none of the following: cilantro, jalapeno, or lime juice.
